title: STAT+: How the Trump administration is recasting government’s role in regulating health technology
description: Federal agencies that used to set up guardrails for health technology have transformed into cheerleaders for new risky technologies like AI.
content: Federal agencies that used to set up guardrails for health technology have transformed into cheerleaders for new risky technologies like AI.
